resources.string: These are the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy of This application. This application which provides you the service of cloning your phone. This privacy policy provides an overview about how we process personal data about users of our mobile applications we provide to you.We will not share your personal information anyone excepts as described in the privacy policy

This application respects your right to privacy. Your ability to make informed choices about the use of your information is important to us. We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Services to you.
Permissions in this Application are the Following

Write External Storage 
Read External Storage 
Read\Write Contacts 
Camera 
Location 
Read\Write call logs 
Install Aplications

We may change this privacy policy from time to time by posting the most current privacy policy and its effective date. In case we change this privacy policy substantially, we may bring such changes to your attention by explicit notice in this page.
We do not include or offer third-party products or services in our application.

Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 ("Children"). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
Hey check out this app to share data or to clone your new phone from your old phone.
Please update app to get better performance.
The easiest way to transfer data to your new phone
Please tap on the device name you want to connect to.
Please Wait\nGetting Data ready to send
Select the contacts which you want to save
Please Turn off Hotspot to continue.\nIf Hotspot is off than plz turn it on and off.
Install applications by clicking the install button
Transfer Has been Completed.\nPlease click ok to start saving data to the device.
If you want to store contacts please click nextand select contacts you want to store.
Are you sure you want to exit?
Something went wrong while transfering data.
Please make sure that you have saved necessary contacts.\nDo you want to continue saving contacts?
During Data transfer Back button is disabled because it can stop data Transfer.\nPlease wait until transfer is completed. Thanks.
Please make sure you have installed all the applications. If you want to install apps latter you can install by opening HSFile manager\n->Phone Clone.\nDo you want to continue installing?
